Issue.creator: huikang
Issue.description: In this example configtx file| https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/a02124e477298a661df88fcc6a18ede98cc2dee9/examples/e2e_cli/configtx.yaml#L361 , the profile name is TwoOrgsChannel. However, it includes 3 orgs. Should the profile name be renamed to _ThreeOrgsChannel_?
